awards.text: Nominated for 3 Golden Globes. Another 10 wins & 21 nominations.

fullplot: A look at a seemingly placid New England town that is actually wrought with illicit affairs, crime and tragedy, all told through the lens of Olive, whose wicked wit and harsh demeanor mask a warm but troubled heart and staunch moral center. The story spans 25 years and focuses on Olive's relationships with her husband, Henry, the good-hearted and kindly town pharmacist; their son, Christopher, who resents his mother's approach to parenting; and other members of their community.
plot: A middle-school math teacher Olive and her relationship with Henry which spans 25 years.
title: Olive Kitteridge
